THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts or mismatches: No notable mismatches. Visual and textual elements both clearly align with the title’s subject matter, making it instantly clear what the video is about. The tone (informative yet approachable) matches the educational intent of the title.
